EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Webinar_Methodology of Modern Software Organisations_Q318.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Live Webinar: The Methodology of Modern Software Organisations
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
I thought you might be interested in the upcoming live webinar: The Methodology of Modern Software Organisations
4th October 2018 1pm AEST / 11am SGT (1 hour)
SAVE YOUR SPOT: https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/oct-4-the-methodology-of-modern-software-organisations-webinar
Transforming how your business builds and runs software is not an easy task. In addition to leveraging cloud-native platforms and tools, it requires the application of agile software development concepts to modernise how your teams design, develop and manage products.
Join us on this webinar as we evaluate the methodologies to help your business implement long-term transformation and build great quality software: - Introducing Extreme Programming - Adopting User-Centred Design - Leveraging Lean Product Management - Four Key Tenets of App Transformation - Introducing Pivotal Labs
Featured Speaker: Paul Krajewski, Product Manager, Pivotal Labs
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
